oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mahfuz, Isam , 1939-2006. The Dicatator
Drama -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Dictator. A play . Starring Antoine Kerbage, directed by Michel Naba'a. Written by Issam Mahfouz. Gulbenkian Theater, Beirut College for Girls. 3 April 1972.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Dictator
